name: FZR
description:
A different take on a zombie game. iI have been sitting on this idea since the onslaught of zombie survival and zombie shooters that peaked around 2009-2010 and I have just now decided to do something with it.

Have you ever wondered why zombies are just mindlessly eating brains all the time? The answer lies deep within zombie mythos: if you eat enough as a zombie you will be freed from this purgatory in which you have been placed.

In Fat Zombie Roguelike-ish you control fat zombie and your goal is to eat as many brains and drink as much blood as possible. Once there is nothing left to consume move on to the next area, and keep mindlessly eating and drinking. Soon you will be free.
